WONDROUS ITEMS

This is a catch-all category for anything that doesn’t fall into the other groups. Anyone can use a wondrous item (unless specified otherwise in 묘사).

Physical 묘사: Varies.

Activation: Usually use activated or 명령 word, but details vary from item to item.

특성: Roll d%. An 01 result indicates the wondrous item is intelligent, 02–31 indicates that something (a design, inscription, or the like) provides a clue to its function, and 32–100 indicates no 특성. 지능있는 아이템 have extra 능력 and sometimes extraordinary powers and special 목적.

고급 아이템 with 돌격 can never be intelligent.

고급 아이템 설명

Wondrous Item Descriptions

Standard 고급 아이템 are described below.

아뮬렛 of Health: This 아뮬렛 is a golden disk on a chain. It usually bears the image of a 사자 or other powerful animal. The 아뮬렛 grants the wearer an enhancement 보너스 to 건강 of +2, +4, or +6.

Moderate 변환술; CL 8th; 고급 아이템 제작, 곰의 지구력; Price 4,000 gp (+2), 16,000 gp (+4), 36,000 gp (+6).

아뮬렛 of Mighty Fists: This 아뮬렛 grants an enhancement 보너스 of +1 to +5 on 공격 and 피해 rolls with unarmed 공격 and natural 무기.

Faint 강신술; CL 5th; 고급 아이템 제작, 상급 마법 송곳니, creator’s 시전자 레벨 must be at least three times 아뮬렛’s 보너스; Price 6,000 gp (+1), 24,000 gp (+2), 54,000 gp (+3), 96,000 gp (+4), 150,000 gp (+5).

아뮬렛 of Natural 갑옷: This 아뮬렛, usually crafted from bone or beast scales, toughens the wearer’s body and flesh, giving him an enhancement 보너스 to his natural 갑옷 보너스 of from +1 to +5, depending on the kind of 아뮬렛.

Faint 변환술; CL 5th; 고급 아이템 제작, 나무껍질피부, creator’s 시전자 레벨 must be at least three times 아뮬렛’s 보너스; Price 2,000 gp (+1), 8,000 gp (+2), 18,000 gp (+3), 32,000 gp (+4), or 50,000 gp (+5).

아뮬렛 of 이세계: This device usually appears to be a black circular 아뮬렛, although any character looking closely at it sees a dark, moving swirl of color. 아뮬렛 allows its wearer to utilize 이세계 전이. However, this is a difficult item to master. The user must make a DC 15 지능 check in order to get 아뮬렛 to take her to the plane (and the specific location on that plane) that she wants. If she fails, 아뮬렛 운송수단 her and all those traveling with her to a random location on that plane (01–60 on d%) or to a random plane (61–100).

Strong 소환술; CL 15th; 고급 아이템 제작, 이세계 전이; Price 120,000 gp.

아뮬렛 of Proof against Detection and Location: This silver 아뮬렛 protects the wearer from 염탐 and magical location just as a 탐지방어 spell does. If a 점술 spell is attempted against the wearer, the caster of 점술 must succeed on a 시전자 레벨 check (1d20 + 시전자 레벨) against a DC of 19 (as if the caster had cast 탐지방어 on herself ).

Moderate 회피술; CL 8th; 고급 아이템 제작, 탐지방어; Price 35,000 gp.

Apparatus of the Crab: This item appears to be a large, sealed iron barrel, but it has a secret catch (탐색 DC 20 to locate) that opens a hatch in one end. Anyone who crawls inside finds ten (unlabeled) levers: The device has the following characteristics: hp 200; hardness 15; Spd 20 ft., 수영 20 ft.; AC 20 (–1 size, +11 natural); Atk +12 melee (2d8, 2 pincers).

Lever (1d10) Lever Function
1 Extend/retract legs and tail
2 Uncover/엄폐 forward porthole
3 Uncover/엄폐 side portholes
4 Extend/retract pincers and feelers
5 Snap pincers
6 이동 forward/backward
7 Turn left/right
8 Open “eyes” with 지속적인 불꽃 inside/close “eyes”
9 Rise/sink in water
10 열기/닫기 hatch

Operating a lever is a full-round action, and no lever may be operated more than once per round. However, since two Medium characters can fit inside, the apparatus can 이동 and 공격 in the same round. The device can function in water up to 900 feet deep. It holds enough air for a crew of two to survive 1d4+1 hours (twice as long for a single occupant). When activated, the apparatus looks something like a 거인 lobster.

Strong 강신술 and 변환술; CL 19th; 고급 아이템 제작, 살아 움직이는 물체, 지속적인 불꽃, creator must have 8 ranks in 지식(architecture and engineering) skill; Price 90,000 gp;Weight 500 lb.

Bag of Holding: This appears to be a common cloth sack about 2 feet by 4 feet in size. The bag of holding opens into a nondimensional space: Its inside is larger than its outside dimensions. Regardless of what is put into the bag, it weighs a fixed amount. This weight, and the limits in weight and volume of the bag’s contents, depend on the bag’s type, as shown on the table below.

Bag Bag Weight Contents Weight Limit Contents Volume Limit 시장 가격
Type I 15 lb. 250 lb. 30 cu. ft. 2,500 gp
Type II 25 lb. 500 lb. 70 cu. ft. 5,000 gp
Type III 35 lb. 1,000 lb. 150 cu. ft. 7,400 gp
Type IV 60 lb. 1,500 lb. 250 cu. ft. 10,000 gp

If the bag is overloaded, or if sharp objects pierce it (from inside or outside), the bag ruptures and is ruined. All contents are lost forever. If a bag of holding is turned inside out, its contents spill out, unharmed, but the bag must be put right before it can be used again. If living creatures are placed within the bag, they can survive for up to 10 minutes, after which time they suffocate. Retrieving a specific item from a bag of holding is a 이동 action—unless the bag contains more than an ordinary backpack would hold, in which case retrieving a specific item is a full-round action.

If a bag of holding is placed within a portable hole a rift to 영적 세계 is torn in the space: Bag and hole alike are sucked into the void and forever lost. If a portable hole is placed within a bag of holding, it opens a 관문 to 영적 세계: The hole, the bag, and any creatures within a 10-foot radius are drawn there, destroying the portable hole and bag of holding in the process.

Moderate 소환술; CL 9th; 고급 아이템 제작, 비밀 상자.

Bag of Tricks: This small sack appears normal and empty. However, anyone reaching into the bag feels a small, fuzzy ball. If the ball is removed and tossed up to 20 feet away, it turns into an animal. The animal serves the character who drew it from the bag for 10 minutes (or until slain or ordered back into the bag), at which point it disappears. It can follow any of 명령 described in 동물 조련 skill. Each of the three kinds of a bag of tricks produces a different set of animals. Use the following tables to determine what animals can be drawn out of each.

The heavy warhorse appears with harness and tack and accepts the character who drew it from the bag as a rider.

Animals produced are always random, and only one may exist at a time. Up to ten animals can be drawn from the bag each week.

Faint or moderate 소환술; CL 3rd (gray), 5th (rust), 9th (tan); 고급 아이템 제작, 자연의 동료 II 소환 (gray), 자연의 동료 III 소환 (rust), or summon nature’s ally V (tan); Price 900 gp (gray); 3,000 gp (rust); 6,300 gp (tan).

Bead of Force: This small black sphere appears to be a lusterless pearl. You can throw it up to 60 feet with no 거리 페널티. Upon sharp impact, the bead explodes, 송신 forth a 폭발 that deals 5d6 points of force 피해 to all creatures within a 10-foot radius.

It functions like a 탄성의 구 spell (Reflex DC 16 negates) with a radius of 10 feet and a 지속시간 of 10 minutes. A globe of shimmering force encloses a creature, provided the latter is small enough to fit within the diameter of the sphere. The sphere contains its subject for the spell’s 지속시간. The sphere is not subject to 피해 of any sort except from a rod of cancellation, a rod of negation, 분해, or a targeted 마법 무효화 spell. These effects destroy the sphere without 해악 to the subject. Nothing can pass through the sphere, inside or out, though the subject can breathe normally. The subject may struggle, but the globe cannot be physically moved either by people outside it or by the struggles of those within.

The explosion completely consumes the bead, making this a one-use item.

Moderate 강신술; CL 10th; 고급 아이템 제작, 탄성의 구; Price 3,000 gp.

Belt, 수도사’s: This simple rope belt, when wrapped around a character’s waist, confers great ability in unarmed 전투. The wearer’s AC and unarmed 피해 is treated as a 수도사 of five 레벨 higher. If donned by a character with the 기절 주먹 feat, the belt lets her make one additional stunning 공격 per day. If the character is not a 수도사, she gains the AC and unarmed 피해 of a 5th-레벨 수도사. This AC 보너스 functions just like the 수도사’s AC 보너스.

Moderate 변환술; CL 10th; 고급 아이템 제작, 의로운 권능 or 변형; Price 13,000 gp; Weight 1 lb.
